public interface LoginController

Represents a login controller

Author:
krigu

Method Summary
 SessionController login(Integer doctorId, String password)
          Creates a new sessioncontroller, if the doctorId and the password is valid
 

Method Detail

login

SessionController login(Integer doctorId,
                        String password)
                        throws LoginException
Creates a new sessioncontroller, if the doctorId and the password is valid

Parameters:
doctorId - The ID of the doctor
password - The password
Returns:
returns a sessioncontroller
Throws:
LoginException - If no doctor with the given Id exists or if the password does not match
